'''2.1.2494-beta''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.2495-beta''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.2496-beta''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on February 21, 2019.

== Additions ==
* New download system that should improve download reliability and speed.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-10562}}: MinecraftLauncher fails to update if %APPDATA%\.minecraft is a NTFS Junction.
* {{bug|MCL-10571}}: <code>Shuniji.ogg</code> is corrupted on downloads from UK.
</onlyinclude>
